title: Why cant i buy elementalist lux
body: I am happy and really excited for the new ultimate skin. I was just wondering when I can buy it

replies.body: Should be released tomorrow on the 28th of Nov. The Germany LoL facebook page said that in a post.

I'm pretty pumped for this new skin too, friend. I don't have a date on when it will go on sale, but if we both keep an eye on the [Sales Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales), we'll be able to catch when it comes out! :D

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oXeJgtrh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-28T02:41:24.787+0000)
>
> I'm pretty pumped for this new skin too, friend. I don't have a date on when it will go on sale, but if we both keep an eye on the [Sales Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales), we'll be able to catch when it comes out! :D

Dude? u work for riot? cuz riot made an announcement on the german facebook page. elem lux will be released on the 28th
you mind getting up from your desk and ask someone who actually knows why they announced that?
